autumn.util.test

Class UnitTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.util.test.UnitTester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tester

    public final class UnitTester
extends java.lang.Object
implements Tester
    An instance of this class runs unit-tests contained in a group of modules.

      UnitTester()

      This method creates a view of the modules that will be unit-tested.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UnitTester

        public UnitTester()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Class module)
        This method adds a module to the set of modules that will be unit-tested.

        The singleton instance of the module will be retrieved via reflection.

        Parameters:
        module - is the class-object that represents the type of the module.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if module is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an instance of the module could not be obtained.

      • add

        public void add(Module module)
        This method adds a module to the set of modules that will be unit-tested.

        An instance of a module can be obtained via its special instance() method.

        Specified by:
        add in interface Tester
        Parameters:
        module - is singleton instance of the module.

      • modules

        public java.util.Set<Module> modules()
        This method creates a view of the modules that will be unit-tested.
        Specified by:
        modules in interface Tester
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable view of the set of modules that will be unit-tested.

      • run

        public TestResults run()
        This method causes the previously specified modules to be unit-tested.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Tester
        Returns:
        the results of the unit-tests.
